name: Desecration (Caffeinated Co)
description:
Game Desecration

Green-skinned fools have existed at the top of the ladder for too long! Fight your way through Legions of goblins frothing at the bit to leave you and your party no more then mangled corpses!

Location

 Set in the luxurious, mountain peak city of Askabar. and the surrounding area. Goblin cities festering in the cold of It Hill, meant to be taken out by whatever means necessary.

Development Going Forward

The game is still in Pre-Alpha. So if you have any suggestions of ways to make the game better please let me know. I'm just one guy balancing this is with school. So please understand if it takes awhile for me to Implement your suggestions.

Special Thanks

Zeno Animations is a friend and YouTuber who made the image for the title screen.  please check out their animations.
